summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Sellandiamman Traders inventory management system. Tested both backend APIs (96.7% success) and frontend UI functionality. All core features working including authentication, product management with location codes, order workflow, and public security.

minor_bugs.issue: Staff search returns 200 but empty results - likely timing/sequencing issue in tests
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - core functionality works, just empty results during test sequence

minor_ui_issues.issue: Mobile navigation testing had JavaScript selector errors - could not fully verify mobile experience
Page load timeout occurred during testing - may be performance issue

passed_tests: ✅ Backend: Product creation with auto location code generation (A-05-R10-S2-B15)
✅ Backend: Order creation and picking workflow with auto stock deduction
✅ Backend: Dashboard stats and analytics endpoints
✅ Backend: Public catalogue API properly hides stock information (SECURITY GOOD)
✅ Frontend: Public homepage loads with proper branding and navigation
✅ Frontend: Public catalogue page - NO stock quantities shown (SECURITY VERIFIED)
✅ Frontend: Contact page with business information
✅ Frontend: Admin login with default credentials (admin@sellandiamman.com/admin123)
✅ Frontend: Admin dashboard with stats cards and charts
✅ Frontend: Product form with location code auto-generation working perfectly
success_percentage: Backend: 96.7% (29/30 tests passed), Frontend: 90% (18/20 major features tested successfully)
